each-item: Each item is created by our talented creative director Justyna and handmade with care in Poland. If you cannot find your size, get in touch with us and we will do our best to help. Email us on <0>connect@mynalabel.com</0> or click <1>here</1> for more information about orders.
receive-your: Receive your favourite items(s) within 5 to 7 days once shipped. For countries outside of Europe shipping may take longer, please enquire for specific country. All items are shipped within 3 business days from placing your order, with the exception of pre-ordered pieces. Pre-order pieces are made within 1 to 2 weeks. Email us at <0>connect@mynalabel.com</0>. You have 14 days to change your mind. Sale orders are non refundable.
